channel.title: Comments on: MySQL was down for 2 days …

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: Finished more cleanup jobs, it seems upstart job was corrupted for whatever reason, and again, with the principle of "don't solve everything", I just reinstalled mysql-server-* packages and seems everything's working fine now.
item.content:encoded: Finished more cleanup jobs, it seems upstart job was corrupted for whatever reason, and again, with the principle of “don’t solve everything”, I just reinstalled mysql-server-* packages and seems everything’s working fine now.
